scripts.prepublishOnly: del dist; cpy assets dist/assets; tsc --declaration
scripts.watch: del dist; cpy assets dist/assets; npm-run-all --silent --parallel watch:*
scripts.watch#nodemon: wait-for-change dist; nodemon --quiet --watch dist --ext js --exec "node --require node-env-dev --inspect" dist/index.js
